subclause.title: SubClause
subclause.p: Food premises must have an adequate supply of water if water is to be used at the food premises for any of the activities conducted on the food premises.

subclause.title: SubClause
subclause.p: A food premises must use potable water for all activities that use water that are conducted on the food premises.

callout.p: If a food business demonstrates that the use of non-potable water for a purpose will not adversely affect the safety of the food handled by the food business TAS I4P3(2) does not apply.
